mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ShoppingCart ( shCa_UserId, shCa_ProductId, shCa_Count, shCa_Createdate, shCa_Updatedate )values ( #{shcaUserid}, #{shcaProductid}, #{shcaCount}, #{shcaCreatedate}, #{shcaUpdatedate} )
mapper.update: update tbl_ShoppingCart set shCa_UserId=#{shcaUserid}, shCa_ProductId=#{shcaProductid}, shCa_Count=#{shcaCount}, shCa_Createdate=#{shcaCreatedate}, shCa_Updatedate=#{shcaUpdatedate} where pk_ShoppingCart=#{pkShoppingcart}
mapper.select: select pk_ShoppingCart, shCa_UserId, shCa_ProductId, shCa_Count, shCa_Createdate, shCa_Updatedate from tbl_ShoppingCart where pk_ShoppingCart=#{pkShoppingcart}
select pk_ShoppingCart, shCa_UserId, shCa_ProductId, shCa_Count, shCa_Createdate, shCa_Updatedate from tbl_ShoppingCart where pk_ShoppingCart=#{pkShoppingcart}
select pk_ShoppingCart, shCa_UserId, shCa_ProductId, shCa_Count, shCa_Createdate, shCa_Updatedate from tbl_ShoppingCart where shCa_ProductId=#{shcaProductid} and shCa_UserId = #{shcaUserid}

select s.pk_ShoppingCart, s.shCa_ProductId, p.prod_ProductName prodProductName, p.prod_MarketPrice prodMarketPrice, case when p.prod_DiscountPrice is null then 0.00 ELSE p.prod_DiscountPrice END prodDiscountPrice, p.prod_Brand prodBrand, (CASE WHEN p.prod_ProductName is not NULL THEN '万马品牌' END) prodBrandName, getFullPath('proImage',s.shCa_ProductId) as prodProductimage, s.shCa_Count, pc.prCa_Name prCaName from tbl_ShoppingCart s left join tbl_Product p on s.shCa_ProductId = p.pk_Product left join tbl_ProductCategory pc on p.prod_CategoryId = pc.pk_ProductCategory where s.shCa_UserId = #{pkUserInfo}
